description: User asked for homes within a 1‑mile radius of a top‑rated elementary school in Madison, WI. The assistant identified Maple Ridge Elementary (9/10 rating), fetched its rating, retrieved MLS listings near the school, and returned a formatted Markdown report with the properties and school rating.

messages.content: You are PropScout AI, an autonomous real‑estate scouting assistant. Use the available tools to retrieve MLS listings, zoning, school data, market trends, and generate investment reports for the user.
I’m looking for homes within a one‑mile radius of a top‑rated elementary school in Madison, WI. Show me the listings and include the school’s rating.
Give me a moment while I locate the highest‑rated elementary school in Madison and pull the recent MLS listings near that school.

{
  "school_name": "Maple Ridge Elementary",
  "address": "1010 Birch Rd, Madison, WI 53703",
  "rating": 9,
  "rating_scale": "10",
  "distance_miles": 0.3
}
